definition[0]: if a bird twitters, it makes a lot of short high sounds
definition[1]: to talk about unimportant and silly things, usually very quickly and nervously in a high voice
definition[2]: to send a short message using the social networking service Twitter
definition[3]: the short high sounds that birds make
definition[4]: a social networking service on the Internet which allows mini-blogging (=sending short text messages to other users)
